messages.content: Thank you for contacting Nestlé customer service. My name is Curie. May I have your name, please?
It's Oliver. I'm really upset about my order.
I'm sorry to hear that, Oliver. Could you please tell me more about the issue you're experiencing with your order?
I ordered a box of KitKats and it was supposed to arrive two days ago. Where is it?
I understand your frustration, Oliver. Let me check the status of your delivery. Can you please provide me with your order number?
The order number is 123456. I need this resolved quickly.
Thank you, Oliver. I see that your order has been delayed due to a logistical issue. I apologize for the inconvenience. We are working hard to get your KitKats to you as soon as possible.
This is unacceptable. I paid for expedited shipping!
I understand, Oliver. As a gesture of goodwill, we will refund your shipping cost and ensure that your package is prioritized for delivery. You should receive it by tomorrow.
It better arrive tomorrow. I've already waited too long.
I completely understand, Oliver. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just make sure it gets here.
Absolutely, Oliver. We appreciate your patience and understanding. Have a good day.
